title: Atlas robot collapse to 0,0,0 when a collision is done again first step in Q3

content.raw:
While testing Q3 VRC, when walking with the robot directly forward the first step and collision, the robot collapse to 0,0,0.

Software used for the test: gazebo-1.6.1-2~precise, drscim (source. branch short_walk_sequences2 commit :42db4cf97c8b), sandia-hand-5.1.12-1~precise, osrf-common-1.0.6-1~precise).

More information and video can be found in the test plan Q3-r2
